titles.title: Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform in the One Hundred Fifteenth Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: Provides amounts for the expenses of the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform for the 115th Congress.
